topic.topicDialog: After marking your students' work, it's easy to keep track of how they're doing by looking at the Student Results & Progress Report.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, access the course to which your students are assigned.
In the Teaching Groups panel, click on the + next to the group name to see a list of the students within the group.
Click on the name of a student to open the report.
The pop-up window will display the marks this student has received for all work assigned to them and an average score for all assignments.
